title: I cannot connect my phone using an OTG cable
answer:
When connecting an OTG cable to your phone, the phone acts like a card reader. Please check whether your phone supports a microSD card and the USB drive function. If not, please use another phone. 

 Check whether the microSD card was inserted into the phone correctly. 

 If a microSD card has already been inserted, check whether USB drive mode is activated on the connected phone. 

 When using an OTG cable to connect your phone to a USB storage device, the phone will provide power to the device. Some USB storage devices that have a high power rating such as portable hard drives or phones may not function properly.
keywords: OTG data cable, USB OTG data cable, phone, connect phone, failed
